name: ParticleArena- beta
description:
UPDATED 7.1.2015
Version 0.03beta

THIS GAME IS MEANT TO BE PLAYED WITH A CONTROLLER!

There are a few known issues that will be fixed in a future update...
As long as you aren't repeatedly mashing buttons like a crazy person, things should work fine...ish.

CHANGES:

Control Changes

*****************************************************

ParticleArena
Fight ever increasing numbers of enemies and fire your thruster for high speed maneuvering. Collect Fuel Pods to power your thruster, and use Time Dilation to slow time down to a crawl. Use this advantage to better attack and evade your enemies! Control the zoom of the camera with a button press to take a closer look or get a wider view of your surroundings. And most important…Have Fun!
